name: is_sabbath_day
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool enoch_calendar.
Tool description: Access the Biblical Holydays and Sabbaths using the Enoch Calendar
API description: Determines if the given date string or today's date is a Sabbath day using the Enoch Calendar API.

datestring.description: The date string to check in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
